payload.content: AI agents provide "default bottom up interoperability" by enabling users to log in across services, bypass walled gardens, and aggregate content and data, thereby reducing platform control.

name: AI agents provide "default bottom up interoperability" by enabling users to log
content: AI agents provide "default bottom up interoperability" by enabling users to log in across services, bypass walled gardens, and aggregate content and data, thereby reducing platform control.

payload.content: The interoperability provided by AI agents erodes and wipes out the security and encryption previously offered by platform 'garden walls'.

name: The interoperability provided by AI agents erodes and wipes out the security and
content: The interoperability provided by AI agents erodes and wipes out the security and encryption previously offered by platform 'garden walls'.

payload.content: Having end-to-end encrypted messages read by an AI bot converts private messages into plain text, which is then processed by a model potentially run by entities with divided loyalties.

name: Having end-to-end encrypted messages read by an AI bot converts private messages
content: Having end-to-end encrypted messages read by an AI bot converts private messages into plain text, which is then processed by a model potentially run by entities with divided loyalties.

payload.content: Beyond platform agents and agent advocates, there is a possibility of 'state agents' — universal intermediaries that mediate digital interactions and monitor users for state interests, such as the CCP.

name: Beyond platform agents and agent advocates, there is a possibility of 'state age
content: Beyond platform agents and agent advocates, there is a possibility of 'state agents' — universal intermediaries that mediate digital interactions and monitor users for state interests, such as the CCP.

payload.content: Enabling genuinely secure, private inference for AI agents should be an urgent priority.

name: Enabling genuinely secure, private inference for AI agents should be an urgent p
content: Enabling genuinely secure, private inference for AI agents should be an urgent priority.

payload.content: Chinese-hosted AI agents should be considered a non-starter to prevent a situation similar to TikTok, where foreign-controlled digital services create dependency and security concerns.

name: Chinese-hosted AI agents should be considered a non-starter to prevent a situati
content: Chinese-hosted AI agents should be considered a non-starter to prevent a situation similar to TikTok, where foreign-controlled digital services create dependency and security concerns.
